languages.text:
Двигатель крейсера поврежден.
В течении 3х раундов скорость крейсера будет снижаться на 33%, до полной остановки.

traits.locale_text:
Двигатель крейсера поврежден.
В течении 3х раундов скорость крейсера будет снижаться на 33%, до полной остановки.

languages.text: This vessel's thrusters are damaged. During the next three rounds, its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} will be gradually reduced by one third of original speed every round until it stops completely.
languages.original_text: Двигатели корабля повреждены. Каждый раунд его {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорость{/g} будет постепенно уменьшаться на треть от изначальной. Через 3 раунда он остановится.

traits.locale_text: This vessel's thrusters are damaged. During the next three rounds, its speed will be gradually reduced by third until it stops.

This vessel's thrusters are damaged. During the next three rounds, its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} will be gradually reduced by one third of original speed every round until it stops completely.

This vessel's thrusters are damaged. During the next three rounds, its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} will be gradually reduced by one third of original speed every round until it stops completely.

This vessel's thrusters are damaged. During the next three rounds, its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} will be gradually reduced by one third of original speed every round until it stops completely.

languages.text: Bu geminin itiş motoru hasarlı. Geminin {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}hızı{/g} sonraki üç raunt boyunca her rauntta normal hızının üçte biri oranında azalacak ve gemi en sonunda tamamen duracak.
languages.original_text: This vessel's thrusters are damaged. During the next three rounds, its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} will be gradually reduced by one third of original speed every round until it stops completely.

traits.locale_text: Bu geminin itiş motoru hasarlı. Geminin {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}hızı{/g} sonraki üç raunt boyunca her rauntta normal hızının üçte biri oranında azalacak ve gemi en sonunda tamamen duracak.

languages.text: Los propulsores de esta nave están dañados. Durante los próximos 3 asaltos, su {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} se reducirá gradualmente un tercio de su velocidad original cada asalto hasta detenerse por completo.
languages.original_text: This vessel's thrusters are damaged. During the next three rounds, its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} will be gradually reduced by one third of original speed every round until it stops completely.

traits.locale_text: Los propulsores de esta nave están dañados. Durante los próximos 3 asaltos, su {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} se reducirá gradualmente un tercio de su velocidad original cada asalto hasta detenerse por completo.

languages.text: 这艘舰船的推进器已损坏。在接下来的三轮中，它的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}每轮都会降低原有速度的三分之一，直到完全停止。
languages.original_text: This vessel's thrusters are damaged. During the next three rounds, its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} will be gradually reduced by one third of original speed every round until it stops completely.

traits.locale_text: 这艘舰船的推进器已损坏。在接下来的三轮中，它的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}每轮都会降低原有速度的三分之一，直到完全停止。

languages.text: Les propulseurs de ce vaisseau sont endommagés. Il perdra un tiers de sa {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} d'origine par round pendant les trois prochains rounds, jusqu'à ce qu'il s'immobilise.
languages.original_text: This vessel's thrusters are damaged. During the next three rounds, its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} will be gradually reduced by one third of original speed every round until it stops completely.

traits.locale_text: Les propulseurs de ce vaisseau sont endommagés. Il perdra un tiers de sa {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} d'origine par round pendant les trois prochains rounds, jusqu'à ce qu'il s'immobilise.

languages.text: この船のスラスターが損傷する。次の3ラウンドで、船が完全に停止するまで毎ラウンドごとに元のスピードの1/3ずつ{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}が低下する。
languages.original_text: This vessel's thrusters are damaged. During the next three rounds, its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} will be gradually reduced by one third of original speed every round until it stops completely.

traits.locale_text: この船のスラスターが損傷する。次の3ラウンドで、船が完全に停止するまで毎ラウンドごとに元のスピードの1/3ずつ{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}が低下する。

languages.text: Die Triebwerke dieses Schiffes sind beschädigt. Im Laufe der nächsten drei Runden verliert es in jeder Runde ein Drittel seiner ursprünglichen {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g}, bis es vollständig zum Stillstand kommt.
languages.original_text: This vessel's thrusters are damaged. During the next three rounds, its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} will be gradually reduced by one third of original speed every round until it stops completely.

traits.locale_text: Die Triebwerke dieses Schiffes sind beschädigt. Im Laufe der nächsten drei Runden verliert es in jeder Runde ein Drittel seiner ursprünglichen {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g}, bis es vollständig zum Stillstand kommt.

languages.text: Двигатели корабля повреждены. Каждый раунд его {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорость{/g} будет постепенно уменьшаться на треть от изначальной. Через 3 раунда он остановится.
languages.original_text: This vessel's thrusters are damaged. During the next three rounds, its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} will be gradually reduced by one third of original speed every round until it stops completely.
